    • Method Detail

      • createUniqueVariable

        public org.chocosolver.solver.variables.IntVar createUniqueVariable​(Attribute attr,
                                                                    int numPeople)
        Creates a variable for an attribute that can be held by only one person in the solution

        The value of the variable is the index of the person that hold the attribute, starting at 0. Person indexes start at 0 so the index can be used in a list or array.

        Parameters:
        attr -
        numPeople -
        Returns:

        public org.chocosolver.solver.variables.IntVar getVariableFor​(Attribute uniqueAttribute)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the variable or null if such variable was not created.

      • toOptionalAttribute

        public java.util.Optional<Attribute> toOptionalAttribute​(org.chocosolver.solver.variables.IntVar var)
        Checks if a variable is for person for some attribute

        Many variables in a model are not related to people

        Parameters:
        var -
        Returns:
        the attribute, present if the variable is for the person that held the attribute
